title: Personal Information
subtitle: Information about you and your preferences on Google services

section.profileInfoTitle: Information in your profile on Google services
section.profileInfoDesc: Personal information and options to help you manage that information. You can allow others to see some of this data (such as contact information) so they can easily contact you. You can also view a summary of your profiles.
section.basicInfoDesc: Other people using Google services may be able to see some information.
